analytics.name: Overall Analytics
analytics.description: You can always see growth areas both for individual employees and for the entire company, and adjust plans, motivation, meetings, and sales strategies accordingly.

education.name: On-site staff training
education.description: The system provides personalized feedback for each specific sale based on the company’s standards, allowing high service quality regardless of the employee’s experience.

dashboards.name: Dashboards and reports
dashboards.description: Management sees the stats: who doesn’t mention promotions, who has poor sales, and where clients are being lost.

1.name: Gamification and motivation
1.description: Leaderboards, badges, and an internal ’Wall of Honor’ to encourage employees to improve rather than fear punishment.

2.name: Personalized recommendations
2.description: The system praises employees and tells them how they could improve: «Great that you offered coffee, but don’t forget the combo discount.»

3.name: Setup in just a few minutes
3.description: Just place the GIDEONE device in the checkout area and register in the system — it’s that simple!

4.name: Criteria customization for your business
4.description: You can configure multiple sales scenarios, setting up key phrases, upselling, promotions, target products — everything your staff needs to follow.
